forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Heavy rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
